title: Klay Day In The Bay
description:
Brian Windhorst is joined by ESPN’s Nick Friedell and Marc J. Spears discuss the impact of Klay Thompson’s return to the Warriors, his performance in his first game back, the ceiling for Golden State, potential Ben Simmons trades and who needs to make a move.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: Hoop Collective: Reacting To Klay Thompson's Triumphant Return To Golden State
